education.details: Focused on systems programming and machine learning. Coursework includes Operating Systems, Parallel Computing, and Machine Learning. Research assistant in the Systems Group working on optimizing distributed systems.

work.description: Built educational software for incarcerated individuals, focusing on offline-first architecture and secure content delivery. Implemented a custom caching system that reduced data usage by 40%.
Led environmental data analysis projects that directly influenced policy decisions. Created predictive models for air quality assessment using historical sensor data and weather patterns.
Developed real-time water level monitoring systems using IoT sensors. Built data pipelines that processed readings from over 1000 sensors, providing crucial environmental insights.

projects.name: Ouradio
projects.description: A collaborative radio platform that enables shared music experiences. Built with Next.js and WebRTC, featuring real-time synchronization and social features that create a unique listening experience.

projects.name: Distributed Cache System
projects.description: Built a distributed caching system supporting multiple consistency models. Implemented leader election, conflict resolution, and partition tolerance.

projects.name: Neural Audio Synthesis
projects.description: Developed a deep learning model for generating musical instruments using adversarial networks. Created a web interface for real-time sound synthesis.

projects.name: Environmental Sensor Network
projects.description: Designed and implemented a low-power sensor network for environmental monitoring. Created visualization tools for real-time data analysis.
